ADMIN_NOTIFICATIONS.DEBUG_MODE_ACTIVE: Force Refresh is currently in Debug Mode.
ADMIN_NOTIFICATIONS.CUSTOM_INTERVAL_SET_FAILURE: Oops, your custom interval of %{refreshInterval} minutes must be between %{refreshIntervalMinimum} and %{refreshIntervalMaximum} minutes. Please try again.
ADMIN_NOTIFICATIONS.SITE_DEBUG_MODE_FAILURE: There was an issue updating settings for debug mode. Please try again.
ADMIN_NOTIFICATIONS.SITE_REFRESHED_FAILURE: There was an issue refreshing your site. Please try again.
ADMIN_NOTIFICATIONS.SITE_REFRESHED_SUCCESS: You've successfully refreshed your site. All connected browsers will refresh within %{refreshIntervalValue} %{refreshIntervalUnit}.
ADMIN_NOTIFICATIONS.PAGE_REFRESHED_FAILURE: There was an issue refreshing your page. Please try again.
ADMIN_NOTIFICATIONS.PAGE_REFRESHED_SUCCESS: You've successfully refreshed your page. All connected browsers will refresh within %{refreshIntervalValue} %{refreshIntervalUnit}.
ADMIN_NOTIFICATIONS.SITE_SETTINGS_UPDATED_FAILURE: There was an issue updating your settings. Please try again.
ADMIN_NOTIFICATIONS.SITE_SETTINGS_UPDATED_SUCCESS: You've successfully updated settings for Force Refresh.

ADMIN_TROUBLESHOOTING.DEBUG_MODE_DESCRIPTION_ACTIVE: Debugging mode is currently turned on. This means that Force Refresh will log additional output to the browser console and will not refresh connected browsers.
ADMIN_TROUBLESHOOTING.DEBUG_MODE_DESCRIPTION_INACTIVE: Debugging mode is currently turned off. This means that Force Refresh will operate normally.
ADMIN_TROUBLESHOOTING.TROUBLESHOOTING_VERSION_IS_OUTDATED: Your version of %{label} is outdated. Please update to version %{versionRequired}.
ADMIN_TROUBLESHOOTING.TROUBLESHOOTING_VERSION_IS_DEVELOPMENT_V: Your version of %{label} is an unsupported development version.

ADMIN_REFRESH_MAIN.REFRESH_DIRECTIONS: Here, you can force all currently-connected users to manually reload the site "%{siteName}".
ADMIN_REFRESH_MAIN.REFRESH_DIRECTIONS_NO_SITE_NAME: Here, you can force all currently-connected users to manually reload this site.
ADMIN_REFRESH_MAIN.PLUGIN_WARNING_OUTDATED: Psst, just a heads up that your installed version of Force Refresh (%{installedVersion}) is outdated. Visit the Plugins page to update to version %{currentVersion}.
ADMIN_REFRESH_MAIN.PLUGIN_WARNING_DEVELOPMENT_BUILD: Psst, just a heads up that your installed version of Force Refresh (%{installedVersion}) is a development build intended only to be used for debugging purposes. Once debugging is complete, please visit the Plugins page to update to most recent supported version (%{currentVersion}).

RELEASE_NOTES.RELEASE_NOTES_UNAVAILABLE: I'm sorry, but release notes are currently unavailable. Please visit Force Refresh's plugin page to view the full changelog.

SCHEDULE_REFRESH.DESCRIPTION: Please select the date and time you'd like to schedule a refresh.
